name: Get Custom Fields

query_params.name: page
query_params.summary: Which page of results to return

query_params.name: per_page
query_params.summary: The number of results returned per page. Defaults to 25

query_params.name: order
query_params.summary: Provide a field name to change the sort order. Defaults to created_at

query_params.name: direction
query_params.summary: Accepts asc or desc. Defaults to desc

notes:
A custom field is a non Spark default attribute that can be used with contacts, contracts, brokerage, inventory, reservations, and team members.

A custom field on an object (like contacts) is associated to the owner record and stores it's value on the record as a custom_field_value

When using a Company API Key:

Creates a Custom Field at the company level.

Creates a Custom Field at the company level.

If the field is for Contacts, Brokerages, or Team Members , it is automatically shared across all projects.

If the field is for Contacts, Brokerages, or Team Members , it is automatically shared across all projects.

If the field is for Inventory or Contracts , it is not shared by default and must be explicitly shared with projects through the UI.

If the field is for Inventory or Contracts , it is not shared by default and must be explicitly shared with projects through the UI.

When using a Project API Key :

Creates a Custom Field only at the project level.

Creates a Custom Field only at the project level.

These fields remain exclusive to the project and cannot be shared across projects.

These fields remain exclusive to the project and cannot be shared across projects.
